name: CoRR2-cleaninit
inits: BEnv (K NONE)⦇"MEM8" ↦ SOME (BVal_Mem Bit64 Bit8 FEMPTY)⦈
BEnv (K NONE)⦇"x2" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 2w)); "x1" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)); "x6" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x))⦈
BEnv (K NONE)⦇"x3" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x4" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)); "x6" ↦ SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 x))⦈
progs: BirProgram [<|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 0w) "00132023 (sw ra,0(t1))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assert (BExp_unchanged_mem_interval_distinct Bit64 0 1000 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) 4); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Cast BIExp_LowCast (BExp_Den (BVar "x1" (BType_Imm Bit64))) Bit32))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 4w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 4w) "00232023 (sw sp,0(t1))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assert (BExp_unchanged_mem_interval_distinct Bit64 0 1000 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) 4); BStmt_Assign (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8)) (BExp_Store (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian (BExp_Cast BIExp_LowCast (BExp_Den (BVar "x2" (BType_Imm Bit64))) Bit32))]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 8w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 8w) "00000013 (nop)"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := []; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Halt (BExp_Const (Imm32 0w))|>]

BirProgram [<|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 0w) "00032183 (lw gp,0(t1))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assign (BVar "x3" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Cast BIExp_SignedCast (BExp_Load (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian Bit32) Bit64)]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 4w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 4w) "00032203 (lw tp,0(t1))"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := [BStmt_Assert (BExp_Aligned Bit64 2 (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64)))); BStmt_Assign (BVar "x4" (BType_Imm Bit64)) (BExp_Cast BIExp_SignedCast (BExp_Load (BExp_Den (BVar "MEM8" (BType_Mem Bit64 Bit8))) (BExp_Den (BVar "x6" (BType_Imm Bit64))) BEnd_LittleEndian Bit32) Bit64)]; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Jmp (BLE_Label (BL_Address (Imm64 8w)))|>; <|bb_label := BL_Address_HC (Imm64 8w) "00000013 (nop)"; bb_atomic := F; bb_statements := []; bb_last_statement := BStmt_Halt (BExp_Const (Imm32 0w))|>]
final: λss. ∃(mem,thds). (mem,thds) ∈ ss ⇒ bir_env_lookup "x3" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)) ∧ bir_env_lookup "x4" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)) ∨ bir_env_lookup "x2" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 2w)) ∧ (bir_env_lookup "x4" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 0w)) ∨ bir_env_lookup "x4" (EL 1 thds) = SOME (BVal_Imm (Imm64 1w)))
